title: Surgeon's Story: If You Can't Operate in Heels, You Can't Operate!
description: SURGEON'S STORY is your passport into OR-1, the cardiac surgical suite at Children's Medical Center in Dallas. You'll be there as Dr. Kristine Guleserian, noted pediatric cardiothoracic surgeon, fixes the tiny hearts of the tiniest children. Follow the young boy who gets a new heart and then, three weeks later, joins Dr. Guleserian on the mound at Fenway Park to throw out the first pitch at a World Series game. Discover the years of training Dr. G went through to become the highly respected surgeon she is today. See how her warmth, humor, intelligence and dedication provide a shining example of what is good about the American health care system. To get a closer look than this, you'd have to scrub in.
author: Mark Oristano
